languages.text: "Они будут рады в кои-то веки почувствовать себя не "бесполезным мусором".
"They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."
languages.original_text: "Они будут рады в кои-то веки почувствовать себя не "бесполезным мусором".

traits.locale_text: "They will be happy to not feel like 'useless trash' for once."
"They will be happy to not feel like 'useless trash' for once."
"They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."
"They will be happy to not feel like 'useless trash' for once."
"They will be happy to not feel like 'useless trash' for once."
"They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."
"They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."
"They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

languages.text: “他们应该会很高兴，因为他们终于不是废物了。”
languages.original_text: "They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

traits.locale_text: “他们应该会很高兴，因为他们终于不是废物了。”
“他们应该会很高兴，因为他们终于不再是‘没用的垃圾’了。”

languages.text: «Se alegrarán de no sentirse inútiles por una vez».
languages.original_text: "They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

traits.locale_text: «Se alegrarán de no sentirse inútiles por una vez».

languages.text: 「彼らは一度、 '役立たずのクズと思わなくてすむことを喜ぶでしょう」
languages.original_text: "They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは一度、 '役立たずのクズ 'と思わなくてすむことを喜ぶでしょう」
「彼らは一度、 '役立たずのクズ 'と思わなくてすむことを喜ぶでしょう」

languages.text: « Ils seront reconnaissants d'être considérés autrement que comme des "rebuts inutiles". »
languages.original_text: "They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

traits.locale_text: « Ils seront reconnaissants d'être considérés autrement que comme des "rebuts inutiles". »

languages.text: "Sie werden sich freuen, sich einmal nicht wie menschlicher Abfall zu fühlen."
languages.original_text: "They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

traits.locale_text: "Sie werden sich freuen, sich einmal nicht wie menschlicher Abfall zu fühlen."
"Sie werden froh sein, sich ausnahmsweise mal nicht als 'nutzloser Abschaum' zu fühlen."

languages.text: "Bir kez olsun insan çöpü gibi hissetmemek, hoşlarına gidecektir."
languages.original_text: "They will be glad not to feel like human refuse for once."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kez olsun insan çöpü gibi hissetmemek, hoşlarına gidecektir."
